newsitem.title: THAILAND: Rocket fired to heavens to bring rain kills Thai.
newsitem.headline: Rocket fired to heavens to bring rain kills Thai.

text.p: A home-made rocket aimed at the heavens in a plea for rain backfired and hit a village headman, killing him on the spot, Thai police said on Monday.
Chom Inchan, 48, died at a temple rocket festival in eastern Chantaburi province about 300 km (188 miles) east of Bangkok late on Sunday, they told Reuters.
He was among hundreds of villagers who had gathered at a "Bun Bang Fire" festival where people launch bamboo or iron tube rockets during planting to ask the gods for rain to water their crops.
This time one of the rockets nosedived and hit the victim on the head, killing him instantly, police said.
